events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-04-30 when their vehicle was struck at an intersection.
Assigned the claim to the 'Auto Accident' category after reviewing the initial report and vehicle damage.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim and contact the insured for further details.
Sent confirmation to the customer acknowledging receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining next steps.
Requested the customer submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and driver's license for verification.
Customer provided all requested documents including detailed photos of the car accident and official police report.
Investigators began analyzing the accident circumstances and assessing coverage based on submitted evidence.
The investigation into the collision was completed, confirming fault and estimated repair costs for the vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer for the damages sustained in the accident to cover repairs.
The customer responded expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and quick handling of the claim.
The claim was approved based on investigation findings and acceptance of the proposed settlement offer.
Released the settlement payment to the customer to cover the vehicle repair expenses related to the accident.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after full payment and customer confirmation of received funds.
Archived all case files and documentation for the auto accident claim as it reached official closure status.
